get.description: Returns the raw content of a file, multiple files, or a directory. Supports downloading files as archives in various formats.

Returns the raw content of a file, multiple files, or a directory. Supports downloading files as archives in various formats.
get.summary: Get raw content of a file, multiple files, or directory

parameters.description: a list of files in the following format 'filename' and separated by '||' with additional items in the list. (required)
parameters.name: files

parameters.description: If true, sets 'Content-Disposition' to 'inline'. Otherwise, defaults to 'attachment'.
parameters.name: inline

parameters.description: Compression algorithm for archiving multiple files or directories. Options: 'zip' and 'tar.gz'. Default is 'zip'.
parameters.name: algo

200.description: Raw file or directory content, or archive for multiple files

path.description: path scoped to the associated index

size.description: length in bytes for regular files

type.description: type of the file, either "directory" or a file mimetype

size.description: length in bytes for regular files

type.description: type of the file, either "directory" or a file mimetype

adminPassword.description: the password of the admin user. If not set, the default is "admin".

adminUsername.description: the username of the admin user. If not set, the default is "admin".

key.description: the key used to sign the JWT tokens. If not set, a random key will be generated.

resetAdminOnStart.description: if set to true, the admin user will be reset to the default username and password on startup.

tokenExpirationHours.description: the number of hours until the token expires. Default is 2 hours.

totpSecret.description: secret used to encrypt TOTP secrets

text.description: the text to display on the link

title.description: the title to display on hover

disableDefaultLinks.description: disable default links in the sidebar

disableUsedPercentage.description: disable used percentage for the sources in the sidebar

fileEndsWith.description: list of file names to include/exclude. Eg. "a.jpg"

files.description: list of file names to include/exclude  Eg. "folder1" or "file1.txt" or "folder1/file1.txt" (do not include source path, just the subpaths from the source path)

folders.description: list of folder names to include/exclude. Eg. "folder1" or "folder1/subfolder" (do not include source path, just the subpaths from the source path)

apiLevels.description: separated list of log levels to enable for the API. (eg. "info|warning|error")

json.description: output in json format, currently not supported

levels.description: separated list of log levels to enable. (eg. "info|warning|error|debug")

utc.description: use UTC time in the output instead of local time

noauth.description: if set to true, overrides all other auth methods and disables authentication

ffmpegPath.description: path to ffmpeg directory with ffmpeg and ffprobe (eg. /usr/local/bin)

adminGroup.description: if set, users in this group will be granted admin privileges.

clientId.description: client id of the OIDC application

clientSecret.description: client secret of the OIDC application

disableVerifyTLS.description: disable TLS verification for the OIDC provider. This is insecure and should only be used for testing.

issuerUrl.description: authorization URL of the OIDC provider

logoutRedirectUrl.description: if provider logout url is provided, filebrowser will also redirect to logout url. Custom logout query params are respected.

scopes.description: scopes to request from the OIDC provider

userIdentifier.description: the field value to use as the username. Default is "preferred_username", can also be "email" or "username", or "phone"

internalUrl.description: An optional internal address that the filebrowser server can use to communicate with the OnlyOffice Document Server, could be useful to bypass proxy.

url.description: The URL to the OnlyOffice Document Server, needs to be accessible to the user.

enforcedOtp.description: if set to true, TOTP is enforced for all password users users. Otherwise, users can choose to enable TOTP.

recaptcha.description: recaptcha config, only used if signup is enabled

signup.description: allow signups on login page if enabled -- not secure.

header.description: required header to use for authentication. Security Warning: FileBrowser blindly accepts the header value as username.

logoutRedirectUrl.description: if provider logout url is provided, filebrowser will also redirect to logout url. Custom logout query params are respected.

baseURL.description: base URL for the server, the subpath that the server is running on.

cacheDir.description: path to the cache directory, used for thumbnails and other cached files

debugMedia.description: output ffmpeg stdout for media integration -- careful can produces lots of output!

disablePreviewResize.description: disable resizing of previews for faster loading over slow connections

disablePreviews.description: disable all previews thumbnails, simple icons will be used

disableTypeDetectionByHeader.description: disable type detection by header, useful if filesystem is slow.

externalUrl.description: used by share links if set

internalUrl.description: used by integrations if set, this is the url that an integration service will use to communicate with filebrowser

maxArchiveSize.description: max pre-archive combined size of files/folder that are allowed to be archived (in GB)

numImageProcessors.description: number of concurrent image processing jobs used to create previews, default is number of cpu cores available.

createUserDir.description: create a user directory for each user

defaultEnabled.description: should be added as a default source for new users?

defaultUserScope.description: default "/" should match folders under path

disableIndexing.description: disable the indexing of this source

exclude.description: exclude files and folders from indexing, if include is not set

include.description: include files and folders from indexing, if exclude is not set

indexingIntervalMinutes.description: optional manual overide interval in seconds to re-index the source

maxWatchers.description: number of concurrent watchers to use for this source, currently not supported

neverWatchPaths.description: paths to never watch, relative to the source path (eg. "/folder/file.txt")

dateFormat.description: when false, the date is relative, when true, the date is an exact timestamp

disableOfficePreviewExt.description: comma separated list of file extensions to disable office preview for

disableOnlyOfficeExt.description: comma separated list of file extensions to disable onlyoffice preview for

disableSettings.description: disable the user from viewing the settings page

disableUpdateNotifications.description: disable update notifications banner for admin users

gallerySize.description: 0-9 - the size of the gallery thumbnails

locale.description: language to use: eg. de, en, or fr

lockPassword.description: disable the user from changing their password

loginMethod.description: login method to use: eg. password, proxy, oidc

quickDownload.description: show icon to download in one click

showHidden.description: show hidden files in the UI. On windows this includes files starting with a dot and windows hidden files

singleClick.description: open directory on single click, also enables middle click to open in new tab

themeColor.description: theme color to use: eg. #ff0000, or var(--red), var(--purple), etc

viewMode.description: view mode to use: eg. normal, list, grid, or compact

token.description:
Token is a random value that will only be set when PasswordHash is set. It is
URL-Safe and is used to download links in password-protected shares via a
query arg.

disableHideSidebar.description: disable the hide sidebar preview for previews and editors

image.description: show real image as icon instead of generic photo icon

motionVideoPreview.description: show multiple frames for videos in preview when hovering

office.description: show preview image for office files

popup.description: show larger popup preview when hovering

video.description: show preview image for video files

dateFormat.description: when false, the date is relative, when true, the date is an exact timestamp

disableOfficePreviewExt.description: comma separated list of file extensions to disable office preview for

disableOnlyOfficeExt.description: comma separated list of file extensions to disable onlyoffice preview for

gallerySize.description: 0-9 - the size of the gallery thumbnails

locale.description: language to use: eg. de, en, or fr

otpEnabled.description: true if TOTP is enabled, false otherwise

perm.description: legacy for migration purposes... og filebrowser has perm attribute

quickDownload.description: show icon to download in one click

showHidden.description: show hidden files in the UI. On windows this includes files starting with a dot and windows hidden files

singleClick.description: open directory on single click, also enables middle click to open in new tab

themeColor.description: theme color to use: eg. #ff0000, or var(--red), var(--purple), etc

viewMode.description: view mode to use: eg. normal, list, grid, or compact
